title: Patch & Network error 6.23
body:
So after patch 6.23 came out. i was having problem that when the patch is scanning or update the internet in my PC only disconnect and when i close the league of legends the internet never disconnect.

Please help

replies.body: Just to clarify what you're saying, you *lose connection to your network* when trying to patch? Could you [grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of what you're seeing?
I am getting this same issue, not sure what is happening, also connected to the internet
When I log in i get connection error and says i have to restart or shut down but there is nothing wrong with my wifi connection so i am not sure what is going on
When I like restart it brings it back to patch 6.22 and when i get it back to 6.23 then it gives me this same issue again once i log in
